sentences.english: 3Yet you are enthroned as the Holy One; you are the praise of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 但你是聖潔的，是用以色列的讚美爲寶座的。

sentences.english: Jesus was pure and sinless and holy.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌是純淨，無罪和聖潔的。

sentences.english: Samson started out with all the assets of a holy, consecrated life.
sentences.chinese: 參孫開始於享受一切神聖的資源的聖潔的人生。

sentences.english: Should divine life be immured in the charnel house of fleshly lust?
sentences.chinese: 聖潔的生活應該埋葬在肉體情慾的墳墓內嗎？

sentences.english: Beauty is life when life unveils her holy face.
sentences.chinese: 當生命摘去遮蓋她聖潔面容的面紗時，美就是生命。

sentences.english: Marriage was instituted by God himself in the time of man's innocency and uprightness.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻是上帝在人無罪，聖潔公義的時候所設立的。

sentences.english: But it is the divine consciousness that connects earth with Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 但是隻有聖潔純粹的意識才能把凡間和天堂相連接。

sentences.english: Sanctity of Battle no longer reduces the cooldown of Exorcism.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥的聖潔現在不再減少驅邪術的冷卻時間。

sentences.english: Emannuel, God is with us, Blessed Redeemer, Living Word.
sentences.chinese: 以馬內利，與人同在的神，聖潔的救主，永活的道。

sentences.english: and put on the new self, created to be like God in true righteousness and holiness” (NIV).
sentences.chinese: 這新人是照着神的形像造的，有真理的仁義和聖潔。

sentences.english: Tasting a mystery resembles getting the first flavor of a scandal; sainted souls do not detest this.
sentences.chinese: 聖潔的靈魂是絕不厭惡這種滋味的。

sentences.english: All acts of service are not equally sanctifying or uniform in the benefits they confer.
sentences.chinese: 所有服務行動都沒有相等的聖潔或一體性的效益。

sentences.english: She was still a holy and pure young girl.
sentences.chinese: 她仍是一個聖潔的少女。

sentences.english: In some ways it was an ennobling influence.
sentences.chinese: 在某些方面，這起到了聖潔的作用。

sentences.english: The holiness of God should govern our thinking about self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 神的聖潔應該支配我們對自尊的思考。

definition: eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
